user_query: I'm looking for some great deals and discounts on various products. Can you provide me with all the available coupons? Additionally, suggest some free coupon codes that I can use to save money on my online purchases.

TaskList.description: Search for all available coupons from various retailers.
Retrieve a list of free coupon codes that users can apply for discounts.
Consolidate the data from steps 1 and 2 and present it to the user.
